author: HoistTheColors
title: Main Page
text: Yes, but where is Jack Sparrow? 41 I like the ride WAY better 3 The poll was created at 18:04 on October 4, 2016, and so far 184 people voted. Please wait, submitting your vote... 10 / 2 / 16 – The first Teaser Trailer and Poster for Dead Men Tell No Tales were released. 3 / 24 / 16 – Reshoots for Dead Men Tell No Tales begin in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada. 3 / 24 / 16 – Paul McCartney joins the cast of Dead Men Tell No Tales . 1 / 20 / 16 – Disney moved Dead Men Tell No Tales to May 26, 2017, taking the place of Star Wars Episode VIII , which was delayed to December 2017. 8 / 24 / 15 – Dead Men Tell No Tales was also showcased at the Walt Disney Content Showcase in Africa in 2016 where concept art, story details and on set images were previewed 8 / 15 / 15 – Dead Men Tell No Tales was showcased at the Disney D23 Expo 2015 where Depp appeared in costume as Jack Sparrow and the film's logo was revealed with Orlando Bloom confirmed to be starring in the film. [1] 7 / 21 / 15 – Director Joachim Rønning announced via Instagram that filming for Dead Men Tell No Tales has wrapped. 11 / 6 / 14 – The Legend of Captain Jack Sparrow 's final day of operation before closing. 07 / 23 / 14 – Walt Disney Studios announces July 7, 2017 as the new release date for Pirates of the Caribbean 5 .
